sections.heading: VenueA. An action brought on behalf of a class shall be brought in a parish of proper venue as to the defendant
sections.text: B. An action brought against a class shall be brought in a parish of proper venue as to any member of the class named as a defendant.Acts 1989, No. 117, ยง1; Acts 1997, No. 839, ยง1, eff. Ju
